text: Music and Lyrics is a 2007 American romantic comedy movie written and directed by Marc Lawrence. It focuses on the relationship that evolves between a former pop music idol (of the fictional band PoP!, which is inspired by Wham! and Duran Duran) and an aspiring writer as they struggle to compose a song for a reigning pop diva. == Cast == * Hugh Grant as Alex Fletcher * Drew Barrymore as Sophie Fisher * Brad Garrett as Chris Riley * Kristen Johnston as Rhonda Fisher * Haley Bennett as Cora Coreman * Aasif Mandvi as Khan * Campbell Scott as Sloan Cates * Jason Antoon as Greg Antonski * Matthew Morrison as Ray, Cora's manager Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Marc Lawrence Category:2007 musical movies Category:2007 romantic comedy movies
title: Music and Lyrics
